afkAutoModChanged.title: AFK AutoMod Rule Changed!
afkAutoModChanged.desc: A change/deletion was detected to the AutoMod rule created by Pomelo. The rule has been reset to its default state. The rule is required for the setting "Block AFK Mentions" to function.

onboarding.title: Thanks for adding Pomelo!
onboarding.desc: As Pomelo is in alpha/beta, you might need to accept new features or change configuration as they are added. This channel will be used to notify you of these changes. You should run `/settings guild` to update your settings to best suit your server.
